Body:
Description: Hello, I was wondering if we could hop in a call and discuss an issue that my team has been facing. We are looking to make custom device groups that can be applied in the manage rights section of the policy settings. 

We are looking to whitelist certain devices on certain machines, but we want to make a custom group of PID,VID and serial numbers to do this. 

Thanks!
Danny
Invitation updated. Attendees: No attendees listed
Invitation updated. Attendees: Eduard Nut, Daniel Harris

What We've Learned Updated: the customer needed a way to add bulk devices to groups as customer rights.
I explained how it works and the steps to achieve this for their use case.
Next Steps Updated: customer confirmed ticket closure
